description: Index of chunked VSME taxonomy files. This file acts as a manifest for the seeder to locate and process each part of the taxonomy.

chunks.name: metadata
chunks.description: Contains the entry point, namespaces, and other top-level metadata.

chunks.name: dimensions
chunks.description: Contains the dimension definitions for creating data cubes.

chunks.name: presentation
chunks.description: Contains the presentation linkbase structure, defining how concepts are organized and displayed.
